title: One Day At A Time
description:
September is National Suicide Prevention Awareness Month. On today's episode, we'll be sharing the story of Robert Campbell, who survived a painful crisis. And he's now sharing a story of hope and renewal.

NOTE: In this episode we talk about suicide, depression, and addiction. If this isn’t the right time for you to listen, maybe another time will be.

Follow Robert on Instagram and Twitter

Donate to the American Foundation for Suicide Prevention through Robert’s team

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Try Athletic Greens today! Claim your special offer at atheleticgreens.com/SMILE

Make a great thing even better. Go to OMGyes.com/SMILE for a special discount.
